009package imagingbook.sampleimages;
010
011import imagingbook.core.resource.ImageResource;
012
013/**
014 * Enumeration defining a set of {@link ImageResource} objects associated
015 * with SIFT test images.
016 * @see ImageResource
017 * @see GeneralTestImage
018 */
019public enum SiftTestImage implements ImageResource {
020        Box00("box00.png"),
021        Box15("box15.png"),
022        Box30("box30.png"),
023        Box45("box45.png"),
024        Box60("box60.png"),
025        Box75("box75.png"),
026        Box90("box90.png"),
027        HalfDiskH("halfdiskH.png"),
028        HalfDiskV("halfdiskV.png"),
029        Ireland02tiny("ireland02tiny.png"),
030        RectangleH("rectangleH.png"),
031        RectangleV("rectangleV.png"),
032        Stars("stars.png"),
033        StarsH("starsH.png"),
034        StarsV("starsV.png"),
035        ;
036        
037private final String filename;
038        
039        SiftTestImage(String filename) {
040                this.filename = filename;
041        }
042        
043        @Override
044        public String getFileName() {
045                return filename;
046        }
047}
